subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: [[注]] (borrowing its sound 주(ju)) + [[乙]] (used as marker to represent the last consonant [[ㄹ]], because of their similarity in shape). One of the ''[[음역자|eumyeokja]]'' ("character for transliteration") used in the {{w|Idu script}} for Korean 줄.

subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[줄]]|rv=jul|mr=chul|y=cwul}}

# rope.
# transcription of Korean [[줄]].

[[Category:Korean-only CJKV Characters|乙+08]]
